title: Remake games count towards immunity?
body:
Straight forward question. Do remade games that are due to an afk player count towards division drop immunity after reaching a new division?

I had a game that was remade by the enemy team (I don't know how).  Their kennen seemed to have dced after buying items and throwing a Q in the jungle. (We invaded). I assume he afked after our invade because the end game screen had their mid laner arguing with their adc bot.

replies.body: /Remake games should not impact your shield, as the system essentially acts like the game never existed.  Hope that helps offer some relief!
